::DrillBit::

He allowed a smile to appeare. He had liked it last night.
"Well, you sure wern't dreaming. I'm sure you know that I really like
you. If you don't want that kind of a relationship, its ok. I understand
that you were drunk." He said, hopeing she did want a relationship.
He didn't just like her, he loved her. And he really enjoyed last night.
